nodes.text: Wolentic Dudge was a resident of Kijimi City on the planet Kijimi. Dudge was short and overweight, and had eyes that were sensitive to glare and heat-retaining blubber. While on Kijimi, Dudge wore a kybuck fur-lined vest.

Wolentic Dudge was created for the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. A concept sculpture of the character, originally known as "Wizard 60," was created by artist Ivan Manzella. The character was portrayed by veteran Star Wars actor Warwick Davis, continuing the tradition of Davis's characters having names beginning with a "W". Davis also portrayed Wizzich Mozzer in the film.
